name: Gemstone Tycoon
description:
Overview:

This is a prototype of Gemstone Tycoon, a rockhounding simulator. Find and sell gemstones to reach your goal of $2500 before the timer runs out!

Instructions:

1.) Press the 'Shake Tray' button to shake the tray and reveal hidden gemstones. 

2.) Click the 'Harvest' button before 'Total Shakes Remaining' runs out.  Too much shaking will spill the gemstones!

3.) The gemstones will be added to your inventory, click on them to sell.

Reach $2500 in 1.5 minutes and you win!

Details:

This game was made in a week by two people. We used 3 assets: the pixel gemstones, the music, and the SFX. All other pixel art and animations were made by us.
